oai_dc:dc.dc:title: United Confederate Veterans (UCV) General Order
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: United Confederate Veterans General Order dated December 1, 1906 appointing "Comrade" R. Y. Rudicil of Summerville (Georgia) to the general staff of the Georgia Division, United Confederate Veterans with the rank of Lt. Col. and assigned as Assistant Adjutant General. Cudicil was a an 1852 graduate of the Medical University of South Carolina and served as the surgeon of the 6th Georgia Cav. Regt., CSA during the war.
